title: Why Fridays May Be Dangerous for Your Health (Ep. 9 Replay)
description: When researchers analyzed which day of the week most F.D.A. drug-safety alerts are released — and what it means for public health — they were stunned. So, what can we do about the “Friday Effect?”
author: bapu@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
content:encoded: When researchers analyzed which day of the week most F.D.A. drug-safety alerts are released — and what it means for public health — they were stunned. So, what can we do about the “Friday Effect?”
